overview: The controversial classic comes of age in this special, expanded, two-disc collector's DVD set that features previously unreleased footage in a new presentation of Steven Scarborough's best-selling masterpiece. XXX superstars Aiden Shaw, Marcus Iron, Blake Harper and Jason Branch are among the amazing hot studs in the cast, and the film's haunting, moody videography is a stunning achievement in adult film. An absolute must-have for any porn lover's collection.
title: Descent
